p.k: Antananarivo is the capital of Madagascar, an island country in Africa famous for its rare plants and animals. In this episode, we stroll around the city of Antananarivo.
p.d: Antananarivo, also known as Tana, is the capital of Madagascar surrounded by hills, an island country in Africa, and over 100 years ago. In this episode, we stroll around the city of Antananarivo.
